altername_name: Cannon Fodder: Amiga Format Christmas Special
name: Cannon Soccer
overview: Released in the Amiga Format cover disk 54b. Sensible Software nailed it with a stroke of pure genius. Our favorite war shooter combined with arguably the best football (or soccer for our Amerian friends) game ever made. This “demo” was a Christmas cover disk on the 1994 copy of Amiga Format magazine. It featured just two levels, “Land of Hope and Glory”, and “It’s Snow Time”. The game is essentially two extra levels for Cannon Fodder and did not get released as a title in its own right. Both of the levels are little more tricky than I remember the original title – mainly due to that ****ing helicopter.
